attributes.action: Taxi licence holders to be have an eyesight and driving assessment every 2 years
attributes.additional_details: I am sure we all have experienced or witness some extremely ''iffy moves'' with taxi drivers.  If they are required to have an assessment every 2 years the driving standard would increase.
attributes.background:
Taxi drivers are supposed to be ''professional drivers'' where you pay to put your life in their hands.
As driving instructors are required to have an assessment every 2 years to maintain standards, HGV drivers are assessed for fitness and ability to drive, why not taxi drivers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because its about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible.

The licensing of taxis is the responsibility of local councils.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
